title: Can't sign up to league

embed.description: Înscrie-te și descarcă League of Legends, cel mai popular joc online multiplayer din lume. LoL este un MOBA competitiv gratuit, în care poți juca cu peste 120 de campioni diferiți.

body: I have an eune account but i decided to make one on euw to play with some friends that are already there. I fill in all the boxes with email, password, age and so on but the reCaptcha does not appear so i press "Play for free". Then i get an error saying reCaptcha is wrong or smt. I tough it's a brower problem but i expierence the same issue on the phone. Can someone check if they see the captcha there?{{champion:17}}

replies.body:
I'm not seeing issues with the CAPTCHA on the page. Can you try [**clearing your browser's cache**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies), then try signing up from [**this link**](https://signup.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/index?realm_key=euw)?

Let me know if this worked!
